articles.author: India Today Sports Desk
articles.title: AUS vs AFG, World Cup 2023: Sachin Tendulkar gives pep talk to Afghanistan team ahead of 'grudge' match - India Today
articles.description: Cricket World Cup 2023: Legendary Sachin Tendulkar addressed the Afghanistan team huddle in Mumbai on the eve of their big-ticket match against Australia. Afghanistan are still in with a chance to reach the semi-finals.
articles.content: The Afghanistan cricket team had a special guest at their team huddle on the eve of their World Cup 2023 match against 5-time champions Australia. Legendary Sachin Tendulkar gave the spirited Afghani… [+2680 chars]
